items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars SCAM !! DO NOT BUY !!!
items.body: SCAM !! DO NOT BUY !!!! Bought for bday brunch, tried on, didn’t like it for the occasion, sent return as is, no refund received!!! Claimed it wasn’t the right item when it definitely was ! I wore an off the shoulder casual green dress instead for my bday bc this was not daytime attire. Need my money back ! Do not deal with this “company” ! Read more

items.author: Iris agosto

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Women's Off Shoulder Dress
items.body: This dress caught my eye and decided to get it. The following is the pros and cons list which was constructed from my experience with the product. Pros: 1) It is very flattering to the figure. 2) The dress is true to size (I'm 5'4" and 125 lbs and medium fit well. No wiggle room though). 3) The fabric feels high quality. It has some stretch, but not much. Which means it holds things in well and accentuates curves. 4) It comes in 2 color options, (I got the black). 5) It comes with 4 different sizes. 6) It's really affordable. 7) The pictures on the product page makes it look like it's super short, but if you don't cinch it up, it cuts off about 2 inches above your knees. 8) The ability to ruche the dress by cinching the dress can hide lots peaks and valleys and smoothing out the silhouette. Cons: 1) The asymmetrical neckline/shoulders takes a bit getting used to. Overall, this is a very flattering dress. I'm not sure where I can ever where this to, but now I own it. My daughter might be getting it. LOL. I highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Crystal June

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The dress was stinking of body odor
items.body: This item arrived with body odor. I am grossed out! Read more
items.author: AmazingAmazon

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Black, Chocolate Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
